acceptedBills.title: Accepted Bills
acceptedBills.noChangeWarning: Insert the exact amount - the terminal does not give change. Refund after payment is not possible.

ageDisclaimer.title: 18+ Voucher purchase disclaimer
ageDisclaimer.subtitle: This kiosk provides access to betting services intended for users aged 18 and above only. By proceeding, you confirm that you are of legal age and understand the risks associated with gambling. Please play responsibly.
ageDisclaimer.warning: It is forbidden for minors to participate in gambling!
ageDisclaimer.bettingWarning1: Gambling services are intended for adults only
ageDisclaimer.bettingWarning2: Participation in gambling may lead to isolation from family, friends, and activities associated with their age
ageDisclaimer.bettingWarning3: Participation in gambling may lead to addiction which requires treatment
ageDisclaimer.finalWarning: The content below is intended for persons over 18 years of age. By clicking, you confirm your majority and accept responsibility for accessing information on the next page.

gaming.title: Gaming Voucher
gaming.body: Buy a voucher for Xbox, PlayStation, or Steam stores.

gamingVouchers.title: Digital voucher
gamingVouchers.informText: Inform yourself about the prices before purchasing
gamingVouchers.description: Use a VCash multipurpose gaming voucher to purchase PlayStation/Xbox/Steam top-ups.
gamingVouchers.qrInfo: Scan or visit vcash.rs for current product prices.
gamingVouchers.qrInfo2: Direct product purchases are not available. Products are purchased and activated using a multi-purpose voucher in a selected amount based on the product/service you wish to activate.

scanInfo.title: Scan the QR code to see the complete offer:

playstation.title: PlayStation Top-Ups
playstation.body: Top up your PSN account and enjoy games, subscriptions, movies, and in-game content of your choice.

xbox.title: XBOX Gift Cards
xbox.body: Top up your Xbox account and redeem the code for games, subscriptions, and digital content from the Microsoft Store.

steam.title: Steam Gift Cards
steam.body: Top up your Steam account and purchase games, add-ons, and in-game content of your choice.

comingSoon.title: More services coming soon
comingSoon.body: We're preparing additional services and popular platforms – even more content you love, coming soon.

bettingVouchers.title: Betting Vouchers
bettingVouchers.description: Use a multi-purpose VCash voucher to add credit to your account.
bettingVouchers.availableServices:
Here you do not choose a bookmaker!
The bookmaker selection and transfer are done after purchasing the voucher.

bettingVouchers.qrInfo2:
Direct purchase of products is not available.
Products are purchased and activated by buying a multi-purpose voucher in a selected value based on the product/service you wish to activate.

balkanBet.title: BalkanBet Betting Shops

soccerBet.title: SoccerBet Betting Shops
soccerBet.body: Top up your SoccerBet account and use the credit for sports betting, casino games, and other fun options offered by SoccerBet.

merkurXTip.title: Merkur X Tip Betting Shops
merkurXTip.body: Top up your MerkurXtip account and discover the world of sports betting, slot games, and exclusive bonuses.

meridianBet.title: MeridianBet Betting Shops
meridianBet.body: Add funds to your MeridianBet account and enjoy a rich selection of sports betting, casino games, and promotions of your choice.

maxBet.title: MaxBet Betting Shops
maxBet.body: Top up your MaxBet account and use the funds for betting, casino games, and other exciting options in the MaxBet offer.

Use a VCash voucher to quickly top up your account at leading bookmakers!
In 4 steps, buy, choose your bookmaker, activate the voucher, and top up your account

errors.overLimit: The voucher amount exceeds the maximum allowed limit for this transaction
errors.invalid: The voucher code is invalid. Please check and try again
errors.used: The voucher code has already been used. Please check and try again
errors.type: The voucher type is not supported. Please check the voucher type and try again
errors.network: Network connection error. Please check your connection and try again
errors.other: An unexpected error occurred. Please contact support if the problem persists

ips.title: IPS Bill Payment
ips.headerSubtitle: Scan your bill and pay instantly
ips.scanPrompt: Place the IPS QR code under the scanner
ips.scanPromptSub: All scanned bills will appear here
ips.selectBillPrompt: Select a bill from the list above to view details and edit the amount.
ips.amountMinError: Amount cannot be less than the original.
ips.amountTooLow: The amount is invalid or less than the minimum.
ips.scanSuccess: Bill for {{recipient}} added to the list.
ips.noChangeWarning: The kiosk only accepts banknotes of 100 RSD and above. The kiosk does not give change. All excess funds will be credited as a VOUCHER.
ips.collectReceipt: Please collect your receipt from the printer.
ips.printingDescription: Please wait while your confirmation is being printed.
